message: Reactjs and angular2 are not comparable. You may use a mix of reactjs and angular2. Angular2 is a framework for building SPAs. Reactjs is a library for building web components. So you won't find routers Api request helpers in reactjs but you'll find a lot of helpers coming out of the box with angular
story: Alaa Attya Mohamed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Angular 2 versus React: There Will Be Blood
caption: medium.com
description: Angular 2 has reached Beta and appears poised to become the hot new framework of 2016. It’s time for a showdown. Let’s s…

data.message: Yes they are comparable specially now that Angular2 is a big hit in Rendering Performance: https://rawgit.com/alincc/angular-test-table/master/angular2/dist/index.html

I still think that they're comparable if you consider react-router (especially that react-router is maintained by Facebook as well)
On the long run React's community (if not Facebook itself) will build the needed toolset for React to do what Angular does

But my only issue with React now is that it changes A LOT and breaks a lot as well

So if you tried to follow a tutorial today that was released a month ago most probably it won't work

Also the ecosystem for React now and the tooling is very shattered, so hopefully they will sort all of that out
